trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays an image.
The Image class enables you to load the following image types: .bmp, .gif, .ico, .jpg, .png, .wdp, and .tiff.
When displaying a multiframe image, only the first frame is displayed.
The animation of multiframe images is not supported by the Image control.

Until the image content is loaded, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> of the control will report as zero, because the image content is used to determine the final size and location of the control.
For a fixed size control, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and/or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties can be set.
However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties but not both.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref> class.
Arranges and sizes an image control.
The size used to arrange the control.
The size of the control.
Gets or sets the base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
A base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
Occurs after the DPI of the screen on which the Image is displayed changes.
To be added.
A <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEvent"></xref> for when the DPI of the screen the Image is on changes.
To be added.
Occurs when there is a failure in the image.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image.ImageFailed"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Updates the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize*> of the image.
This method is called by the parent <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> and is the first pass of layout.
The image will always return its natural size, if it fits within the constraint.
If not, it will return as large a size as it can.
The size that the image should not exceed.
The image's desired size.
Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer?displayProperty=fullName>.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
Called when the DPI at which this Image is rendered changes.
The previous DPI scale setting
The new DPI scale setting
Renders the contents of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref>.
An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> used to render the control.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref> for the image.
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see the type.
## XAML Values *imageUri* A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the image file.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|,
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>|
The source of the drawn image.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image.Source*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that describes how an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Image"></xref> should be stretched to fill the destination rectangle.
A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> will cause your image to stretch to completely fill the output area.
When the output area and the image have different aspect ratios, the image is distorted by this stretching.
To make an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> preserve the aspect ratio of the image, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> (default) or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how the image is scaled.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image.Stretch*> dependency property.
To be added.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The base URI of the current context.
